message: The ability to paste code and have it appear formatted pre with a fixed width font is cool, but then Convore randomly decides to format my other  posts pre and I can't get it to stop.  For example (https://convore.com/arc-runtime-project/commits-to-ar-on-github/1268824/).  I've tried copying and pasting from a word processor so that I'm not pasting plain text, but that seems to work sometimes and sometimes not.
